mapper.select: select borrowlist.bl_id,bd_bo_num, bd_bcode,bd_date, bd_arrears,book.bk_name,book.bk_writer,book.bk_publisher from borrowdetail inner join borrowlist on (borrowdetail.bd_bo_num = borrowlist.bl_num) inner join book on borrowdetail.bd_bcode = book.bk_icode where bd_state_num=1 order by bd_date desc
mapper.update: update borrowdetail set bd_state_num=2, bd_real_return_date=now() where bd_bo_num=#{bd_bo_num}
update book set bk_state="대출가능" where bk_icode=#{bd_bcode}
mapper.insert: insert into board (bb_title, bb_content, bb_name, bb_bnum, bb_id) values (#{bb_title},#{bb_content}, #{bb_name}, #{bb_bnum}, #{bb_id})
mapper.select: select book.bk_name, book.bk_writer, book.bk_publisher, book.bk_icode,borrowdetail.bd_real_return_date, borrowdetail.bd_return_date,borrowdetail.bd_reservation from book join borrowdetail on borrowdetail.bd_bcode=book.bk_icode where borrowdetail.bd_reservation != 0 and DATE_ADD(borrowdetail.bd_real_return_date, INTERVAL 3 DAY) < now()

select DATEDIFF(now(), borrowdetail.bd_return_date) as arrearsdate,book.bk_name,borrowlist.bl_id, book.bk_writer,book.bk_state, book.bk_publisher, book.bk_icode, borrowdetail.bd_real_return_date, borrowdetail.bd_return_date,borrowdetail.bd_bo_num from borrowdetail join book on borrowdetail.bd_bcode=book.bk_icode join borrowlist on borrowlist.bl_num = borrowdetail.bd_bo_num where borrowdetail.bd_arrears='연체'
select count(*) from delivery where(dv_state='배송완료' or dv_state='배송완료[관리자 승인]') and dv_deliveryman = #{dv_deliveryman}
